/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades painted in shades of blue and gray, reflecting the urban architecture of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds adding depth to the background. On the right side of the street, trees and bushes bring a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
